name: BetAgainstMe.com
tag_list: sports, sports-info, fantasy-sports-betting, sports-betting, fantasy-sports, wagering, gambling, social-networking, sports-handicapping, forum, competition, sportsbook, fantasy-gaming
overview:
BetAgainstMe.com is a fantasy sports betting website that allows sports fans to wager on sports and win cash prizes without the risk of losing their own money.

Each member that signs up receives a weekly fantasy bankroll of 20k to wager on a variety of sports including NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA, Soccer, Tennis, MMA, Boxing, Rugby. The object is to turn the fantasy bankroll into as much as possible by betting your fantasy money against the spread as if you would at a real Las Vegas sports book. Players can wager on a variety of bets such straight wagers, parlays, teasers, and if-bets. The persons who are the most profitable for each day, week, and month wins the cash prizes for that period. Players have chances at other prizes as well, including the referral contest in which players are rewarded for referring other players.

Aside from the fantasy sports betting competition, BetAgainstMe.com has a social networking aspect along with a forum that allows members to talk trash and exchange sports picks with one another. Members can add each other as friends to send private messages and comments. BetAgainstMe.com also has a blog, in which you can find the hottest topics in sports being posted on a daily basis.
